1: le dang ldan <mistake>dang//thig</mistake> le e yig ldan pa yi//lho las dang po 'gyur bar bya//yi ge <mistake>ma</mistake> dang mnyam ldan pa'i//de nas byang gi dang po ste//dbus las tha ma <mistake>nge</mistake> bzhin <mistake>du//ai</mistake> yig dang ni sbyor <mistake>pba</mistake> la//
2: nub kyi tha ma 'gyur bar <mistake>bya//tshog</mistake> drag <mistake>po</mistake> yig dang ldan <mistake>pa'i //rlung</mistake> mtshams phyi rol par <mistake>'gyur</mistake> <mistake>ba'o//zhes</mistake> bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//o yig thig le dang <mistake>lan</mistake>
3: pa//dbus las dbu <mistake>mayang</mistake> <mistake>yen</mistake> te//me mtshams pa yi stan ldan <mistake>pa'i //lho</mistake> las <mistake>dbum</mistake> <mistake>'byur</mistake> bar bya//dbus las tha ma de bzhin du//yi ge e dang <mistake>mnyamsbyor</mistake> ba'i//me mtshams phyi rol
4: par 'gyur te//de bzhin dbus <mistake>dang</mistake> tha ma dang //yi ge a dang <mistake>nyam</mistake> ldan pa'i//rlung mtshams phyi rol 'gyur bar bya//thig <mistake>le/ u</mistake> yig dang ldan pa'i//me mtshams phyi rol par 'gyur ro//zhes
5: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas mda' gzhu 'dzin ma <mistake>dang//rdo</mistake> rje kha <mistake>thAa</mistake> <mistake>ma dang//rdo</mistake> rje nyi ma mo <mistake>dang//rdo</mistake> <mistake>rj</mistake> <mistake>bseg</mistake> bya <mistake>lab</mistake> mo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje nyi ma'i lha mo <mistake>bzhis</mistake> gsungs <mistake>so//glung</mistake> bu ma
6: sogs 'dus pa <mistake>dang//sgo</mistake> <mistake>bsrungs</mistake> ma sogs <mistake>'dus</mistake> <mistake>pa</mistake> ste//me tog ma sogs 'dus nas <mistake>kyang//rtsa</mistake> ba'i dkyil 'khor la <mistake>bsked</mistake> <mistake>'dod //cas</mistake> bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba <mistake>chan</mistake> po rdo rje sems
7: dpas gsungs <mistake>so/rdo</mistake> rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor <mistake>las//sngags</mistake> 'byung <mistake>pa'i</mistake> tshogs kyi phyag <mistake>rkya</mistake> shes pa'o//o yig thig le dang ldan pa//de bzhin bden bral phyi rol <mistake>pa //thig</mistake> le u yig sbyor
8: bar bya//dbus las bzhi pa gang yin <mistake>dag//yi</mistake> ge <mistake>ai</mistake> dang mnyam ldan pa'i//byang gi <mistake>tzha</mistake> mar 'gyur bar bya//yi ge u yig dang ldan pa'i//bden bral phyi rol pa yin te//dbus las <mistake>bzha</mistake>
